item.description:
Hi Trailblazers, let's go dancing at Brazo's while listening to some live Cuban, Spanish or Latin music! 

Welcome to Brazo. Where the flavors of Latin and South American cuisine are completely at home in northern reaches. It’s everything an exotic journey should be, while only an arm’s length from downtown Portsmouth

Brazo, is a casually elegant Latin American restaurant featuring the cuisine of acclaimed chef, Phelps Dieck. Located in the heart of the eclectically stylish Portsmouth, New Hampshire, Brazo showcases exciting Latin and South American cuisine finely prepared—but never overly so—highlighted by locally grown produce, fresh fish and the finest meats.

Just an arm’s length from Phelps Dieck and Deb Week’s beloved Green Monkey restaurant, Brazo is a vacation for the senses. Cuban, Latin and Spanish music fill the air. Exotic rums, tequilas and pisco tempt from behind the bar. While warmth, hospitality and lively fun flows as if carried by the Gulf Stream from southern latitudes.

Brazo's is located in the heart of historic downtown Portsmouth.  If you know where the Green Monkey restaurant is located, just look across the street and you’ll find Brazo.  They are located at 75 Pleasant Street, in between State and Court Street.

See you at Brazo's!!!

Peter
item.why: Come tap your feet to the sounds of great Latin Music.

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Latin Night-Dancing.
